message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the urgency for you to settle quickly.
I understand time is a factor, but so is fairness. This offer reflects a more balanced approach.
Bob, it's clear we both lose with time. I'm increasing my offer to show I'm serious about settling. Don't let this opportunity slip away.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the only fair solution. Take it or leave it.
Bob, I'm sticking to my guns on this one.  You're losing value far quicker than I am. A 70/30 split is the best you'll get at this point. Don't be stubborn.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm willing to be flexible, but 70/30 is simply unacceptable.  Meet me in the middle at 45/55, or this deal is off.
